title: Girls and Boys
description: First edition, first printing. Soft cover. Photographically illustrated stiff wrappers; no dust jacket as issued. Illustrations and text by Lynda Barry. Designed by H. Silverman & M. Michaelson / Square Studio. 96 pp., with black-and-white illustrations throughout. 5-1/4 x 8-3/8 inches.
author: Lynda Barry
